problems.q: Solve the system: $4x + y = 17; 3x - y = 4$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x + y = 1; 3x - 2y = 8$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x + y = 15; x - y = -3$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x + 2y = 10; 3x - y = -12$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x - y = 13; x + 4y = -7$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x + 2y = 7; 4x - y = -1$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x + 4y = -11; x - y = \frac{1}{2}$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x + y = 8; 5x - y = -8$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x - 2y = 7; 3x + y = 28$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x + y = -13; x - 3y = 11$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $3x + y = 16; x - 4y = 14$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x + y = 11; 2x - y = 10$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $5x + 2y = 9; 3x - y = 1$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x + y = 8; 4x - y = -14$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x + 2y = 9; 5x - 3y = 58$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $4x - 8y = 7; 2x + y = 1$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $3x + 5y = -3; 5x - 5y = -13$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $x - 3y = 7; 6x + 3y = -7$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $2x + 3y = 13; x - y = -1$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
Solve the system: $3x + 2y = 9; 4x - y = -32$. Express your answer as an ordered pair (x, y).
